Row.Text: Library of National History
National College
National Research Institute
Shrine of the Saint
Grand Temple
Apostolic Palace
Heroic Epic
State Armory
National Academy
Grand Bazaar
National Treasury
National Epic
Writers' Guild
Artists' Guild
Musicians' Guild
National Heritage Site
International Airport
Ironworks
National Industrial Complex
Circus Maximus
Grand Menagerie
+10% [ICON_Science] Science in this city. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.

+10% [ICON_Science] Science in this city. Upon completion, grants a one-time [ICON_Science] Science boost equal to five times your current [ICON_Culture] Culture output. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.

+35% [ICON_Production] Production towards Space Race projects in your cities. Triggers the [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka moment for the Satellites and Nuclear Fusion technologies upon completion. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.

Each district in this city that generates [ICON_GreatPerson] Great People points generates 1 additional [ICON_GreatGeneral] Great General point. Land units trained in this city receive +35% Experience. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.

+35% [ICON_Production] Production in this city when producing military units. Reduces maintanance cost of all units by 1 [ICON_Gold] Gold. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.

Land units trained in this city receive +35% Experience. All of your military units receive 1 promotion level. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.
Shrines, Temples, and Worship buildings provide +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.

+1 [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer points from Holy Site districts, +1 [ICON_GreatArtist] Great Artist points from Shrines, and +1 [ICON_GreatMusician] Great Musician points from Temples. [ICON_GreatWork_Religious] Religious Works of Art provide +4 [ICON_Faith] Faith, and all other Great Works created by [ICON_GreatArtist] Great Artists provide +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.

Tourism from [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] Relics and Holy Cities is not diminished by other civilizations who have researched the Enlightenment civic. Your Apostle units can choose from any possible promotions instead of receiving a random promotion. +20% [ICON_Faith] Faith in this city. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.

Grants a free Trader unit in this city, and increases [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity by 1. Foreign [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes to this city provide +6 [ICON_Gold] Gold to this city and the foreign city. +2 [ICON_Gold] to Bonus and Luxury resource tiles worked by this city. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.

+20% [ICON_Gold] Gold in this city. Upon completion, grants a one-time [ICON_Gold] Gold boost equal to five times your current income (before expenses). [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.

Districts in this city provide +2 [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person points of their type (the Theater Square district instead provides +1 [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer, [ICON_GreatArtist] Great Arist, and [ICON_GreatMusician] Great Musician points). [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.
Circus Maximus' [ICON_Amenities] Amenities are extended to each city center within 6 tiles. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.
+1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities in each city in your civilization. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.

The Ironworks' [ICON_Production] Production is extended to each city center within 6 tiles. +1 [ICON_Production] Production to each strategic resourced worked by this city. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.
+20% [ICON_Production] Production in this city.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.

+20% [ICON_Culture] Culture in this city. Automatically themed when all [ICON_GreatWork_Sculpture] Great Work slots are filled. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.

The International Airport's [ICON_Culture] Culture and [ICON_Production] Production are extended to each city center within 6 tiles. +100% [ICON_Tourism] Tourism pressure from this city towards other civilizations in the Modern era or later. +25 [ICON_Tourism] Tourism in this Aerodrome district. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.

Each district in this city that generates [ICON_GreatPerson] Great People points generates 1 additional [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer point. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.

Each district in this city that generates [ICON_GreatPerson] Great People points generates 1 additional [ICON_GreatArtist] Great Artist point. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.

Each district in this city that generates [ICON_GreatPerson] Great People points generates 1 additional [ICON_GreatMusician] Great Musician point. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.

Replace.Text: Theming bonus increasing output by 50% when displaying [ICON_GreatWork_Writing] writings from different writers.
Theming bonus doubling output when displaying works from different artists.
